li.text: Assign only qualified workers to slinging work and crane operation. Before the machine body can be hoisted by a crane, it must be confirmed that all the ropes are strong enough for the weight and that the machine body is handled in a well-balanced position. If a heavy load falls due to breaking of a rope or loss of balance during crane operation, the load may be damaged and workers may be seriously injured.
